Verses: 1 avar Oru Idaththil Jebampanni Mudiththapinbu, Avarudaiya Seesharil Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Yovaan Than Seesharukku Jebam Pannap Podhiththadhupola, Neerum Engalukkup Podhikkavendum Endraan.

2 adharku Avar: Neengal Jebampannum Podhu: Paramandalangalilirukkira Engal Pidhaave, Ummudaiya Naamam Parisuththappaduvadhaaga; Ummudaiya Raajyam Varuvadhaaga; Ummudaiya Siththam Paramandalaththile Seyyappadugiradhupola Boomiyileyum Seyyappaduvadhaaga;
3 engalukku Vendiya Aagaaraththai Andrandrum Engalukkuth Thaarum;

4 engal Paavangalai Engalukku Manniyum; Naangalum Engalidaththil Kadanpatta Evanukkum Mannikkirome; Engalaich Sodhanaikkutpadappannaamal, Theemaiyinindru Engalai Ratchiththukkollum, Endru Sollungal Endraar.
5 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Ungalil Oruvan Thanakkuch Sinegidhanaayirukkiravanidaththil Paadhiraaththiriyile Poi: Sinegidhane,
6 en Sinegidhan Oruvan Vazhippirayaanamaai Ennidaththil Vandhirukkiraan, Avanmun Vaikkiradharku Ennidaththil Ondrumillai, Nee Moondru Appangalai Enakkuk Kadanaakath Tharavendum Endru Kettukkondaan.

7 veettukkul Irukkiravan Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennaith Thondharavu Seyyaadhe, Kadhavu Poottiyaayitru, En Pillaigal Ennodekoodap Paduththirukkiraargal, Naan Ezhundhirundhu, Unakkuth Tharakkoodaadhu Endru Sonnaan.

8 pinbu, Thanakku Avan Sinegidhanaayirukkiradhinimiththam Ezhundhu Avanukkuk Kodaavittaalum, Thannidaththil Avan Varundhik Ketkiradhinimiththamaavadhu Ezhundhirundhu, Avanukkuth Thevaiyaanadhaik Koduppaan Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
9 melum Naan Ungalukkuch Sollugiradhaavadhu: Kelungal, Appozhudhu Ungalukkuk Kodukkappadum; Thedungal, Appozhudhu Kandadaiveergal; Thattungal, Appozhudhu Ungalukkuth Thirakkapdum.
10 enendraal, Ketkiravan Evanum Petrukkollugiraan; Thedugiravan Kandadaigiraan; Thattugiravanukkuth Thirakkappadum.
11 ungalil Thagappanaayirukkira Oruvanidaththil Magan Appangettaal, Avanukkuk Kallaik Koduppaanaa? Meenaikkettaal Meenukkup Padhilaaip Paambaik Koduppaanaa?
12 alladhu Muttaiyaik Kettaal, Avanukkuth Thelaik Koduppaanaa?

13 pollaadhavargalaagiya Neengal Ungal Pillaigalukku Nalla Eevugalaik Kodukka Arindhirukkumpodhu, Parama Pidhaavaanavar Thammidaththil Vendikkollugiravargalukkup Parisuththa Aaviyaik Koduppadhu Adhiga Nichchayam Allavaa Endraar.
14 pinbu Avar Oomaiyaayirundha Oru Pisaasaith Thuraththinaar. Pisaasu Purappattupponapinbu Oomaiyan Pesinaan; Janangal Aachchariyappattaargal.
15 avargalil Silar: Ivan Pisaasugalin Thalaivanaagiya Peyelseboolaikkondu Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiraan Endraargal.
16 veru Silar Avaraich Sodhikkumpadi Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Adaiyaalaththaik Kaattavendumendru Avaridaththil Kettaargal.

17 avargaludaiya Sindhanaigalai Avar Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Thanakkuth Thaane Virodhamaaip Pirindhirukkira Endha Raajyamum Paazhaaippom; Thanakkuththaane Virodhamaaip Pirindhirukkira Endha Veedum Vizhundhupom.
18 saaththaanum Thanakkuththaane Virodhamaaip Pirindhirundhaal Avan Raajyam Eppadi Nilainirkum? Ippadiyirukka, Peyelseboolaikkondu Naan Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiren Engireergale.
19 naan Peyelseboolinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththinaal, Ungal Pillaigal Avaigalai Yaaraale Thuraththugiraargal? Aagaiyaal, Avargale Ungalai Niyaayantheerkkiravargalaayiruppaargal.
20 naan Dhevanudaiya Viralinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugirapadiyaal, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Ungalidaththil Vandhirukkiradhe.
21 aayudhandhariththa Balavaan Than Aramanaiyaik Kaakkirapodhu, Avanudaiyaporul Baththirappattirukkum.
22 avanilum Adhiga Balavaan Vandhu, Avanai Merkolvaaneyaagil, Avan Nambiyirundha Sagala Aayudhavarkkaththaiyum Pariththukkondu, Avanudaiya Kollaipporulaip Pangiduvaan.
23 ennode Iraadhavan Enakku Virodhiyaayirukkiraan, Ennode Serkkaadhavan Sidharadikkiraan.
24 asuththa Aavi Oru Manushanai Vittuppurappadumpodhu, Varanda Idangalil Alaindhu, Ilaippaarudhal Thediyum Kandadaiyaamal: Naan Vittuvandha En Veettukkuth Thirumbippoven Endrusolli,
25 adhil Varumbodhu, Adhu Perukki Jodikkappattirukkak Kandu,

26 thirumbippoi, Thannilum Pollaadha Veru Ezhu Aavigalaik Koottikkonduvandhu, Utpugundhu, Ange Kudiyirukkum; Appozhudhu Andha Manushanudaiya Munnilaimaiyilum Avan Pinnilaimai Adhiga Kedulladhaayirukkum Endraar.
27 avar Ivaikalaich Sollugaiyil, Janakkoottaththilirundha Oru Sthiree Avarai Nokki: Ummaich Sumandha Karppamum Neer Paalunda Mulaigalum Baakkiyamullavaigalendru Saththamittuch Sonnaal.
28 adharku Avar: Appadiyaanaalum, Dhevanudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kettu, Adhaik Kaaththukkollugiravargale Adhiga Baakkiyavaangal Endraar.

29 janangal Thiralaaik Koodivandhirukkirapozhudhu Avar: Indhach Sandhadhiyaar Pollaadhavargalaayirukkiraargal, Adaiyaalaththaith Thedugiraargal; Aanaalum Yonaa Theerkkadharisiyin Adaiyaalameyandri Vere Adaiyaalam Ivargalukkuk Kodukkappaduvadhillai.
30 yonaa Ninive Pattanaththaarukku Adaiyaalamaayirundhadhupola, Manushakumaaranum Indhach Sandhadhikku Adaiyaalamaayiruppaar.

31 thendhesaththu Raajasthiree Saalomonudaiya Gnaanaththaik Ketka Boomiyin Ellaigalilirundhu Vandhaal; Idho, Saalomonilum Periyavar Inge Irukkiraar; Aadhalaal Niyaayaththeerppunaalile Andha Raajasthiree Indhach Sandhadhiyaarodezhundhu Nindru, Ivargalmel Kutranjumaththuvaal.

32 yonaavin Pirasangaththaik Kettu Ninive Pattanaththaar Manandhirumbinaargal; Idho, Yonaavilum Periyavar Inge Irukkiraar; Aadhalaal Niyaayaththeerppunaalile Ninive Pattanaththaar Indhach Sandhadhiyaarotezhundhu Nindru, Ivargalmel Kutranjumaththuvaargal.
33 oruvanum Vilakkaik Koluththi, Maraividaththilaavadhu, Marakkaalin Keezheyaavadhu Vaikkaamal, Ulle Varugiravargal Velichcham Kaanumpadi, Adhai Vilakkuththandinmel Vaippaan.
34 kannaanadhu Sareeraththin Vilakkaayirukkiradhu; Un Kan Thelivaayirundhaal, Un Sareeramuzhuvadhum Velichchamaayirukkum; Un Kan Kettadhaayirundhaal Un Sareeram Muzhuvadhum Irulaayirukkum.
35 aagaiyaal Unnilulla Velichcham Irulaagaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayiru.

36 un Sareeram Orupuraththilum Iruladaindhiraamal Muzhuvadhum Velichchamaayirundhaal, Oru Vilakku Than Piragaasaththinaale Unakku Velichcham Kodukkiradhupola, Un Sareeramuzhuvadhum Velichchamaayirukkum Endraar.
37 avar Ippadip Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Pariseyan Oruvan Thannudanekooda Avar Pagarpojanam Pannavendumendru Avarai Vendikkondaan; Avar Poip Pandhiyirundhaar.
38 avar Pojanampannugiradharkumun Kaikazhuvaamalirundhadhaip Pariseyan Kandu, Aachchariyappattaan.
39 karththar Avanai Nokki: Pariseyaraagiya Neengal Pojanabaana Paaththirangalin Velippuraththaich Suththamaakkugireergal, Ungal Ullamo Kollaiyinaalum Pollaappinaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu.
40 madhikedare, Velippuraththai Undaakkinavar Utpuraththaiyum Undaakkavillaiyo?
41 ungalukku Undaanavaigalil Pichchai Kodungal, Appozhudhu Sagalamum Ungalukkuch Suththamaayirukkum.

42 pariseyare, Ungalukku Aiyo, Neengal Ordhalaam Marukkozhundhu Mudhaliya Sagalavidha Poondugalilum Dhasama Baagam Koduththu, Niyaayaththaiyum Dheva Anbaiyum Vittuvidugireergal; Ivaigalaiyum Seyyavendum, Avaigalaiyum Vittuvidaadhirukkavendume.
43 pariseyare, Ungalukku Aiyo, Jebaaalayangalil Mudhanmaiyaana Aasanangalaiyum, Sandhaigalil Vandhanangalaiyum Virumbugireergal.
44 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaaragare, Pariseyare, Ungalukku Aiyo, Maraindhirukkira Piredhakkuzhigalaippolirukkireergal, Avaigalmel Nadakkira Manusharukku Avaigal Theriyaadhirukkiradhu Endraar.
45 appozhudhu Niyaayasaasthirigalil Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Neer Ippadich Sollugiradhinaal Engalaiyum Nindhikkireere Endraan.
46 adharku Avar: Niyaayasaasthirigale, Ungalukku Aiyo, Sumakka Aridhaana Sumaigalai Manusharmel Sumaththugireergal; Neengalo Ungal Viralgalil Ondrinaalum Andhach Sumaigalaith Thodavummaatteergal.
47 ungalukku Aiyo, Ungal Pidhaakkal Kolaiseydha Theerkkadharisigalukkuk Kallaraigalaik Kattugireergal.

48 aagaiyaal Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kiriyaigalukku Neengalum Udanpattavargalendru Saatchiyidukireergal; Eppadiyendraal, Ungal Pidhaakkal Avargalaik Kolaiseydhaargal, Neengalo Avargalukkuk Kallaraigalaik Kattugireergal.
49 aadhalaal Dhevagnaanamaanadhu: Naan Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Apposdhalargalaiyum Avargalidaththil Anuppuven; Avargalil Silaraik Kolaiseydhu, Silaraith Thunbappaduththuvaargal;

50 aabelin Raththammudhal Balibeedaththukkum Dhevaalayaththukkum Naduve Kolaiyunda Sagariyaavin Raththamvaraikkum, Ulagaththotramudharkondu Sindhappatta Sagala Theerkkadharisigaludaiya Raththappazhiyum Indhach Sandhadhiyinidaththil Ketkappadaththakkadhaaga Appadich Seyvaargal Endru Sollugiradhu.
51 nichchayamaagave Indha Sandhadhiyinidaththil Adhu Ketkappadum Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
52 niyaayasaasthirigale, Ungalukku Aiyo, Arivaagiya Thiravukolai Eduththuk Kondeergal, Neengalum Utpiravesikkiradhillai, Utpiravesikkiravargalaiyum Thadaipannugireergal Endraar.

53 ivaigalai Avargalukku Avar Sollugaiyil, Vedhapaaragarum Pariseyarum Avarmel Kutranjaattumporuttu, Avar Vaaimozhiyil Edhaagilum Pizhai Kandupidikkavendum Endru Ubaayampanni Avarai Migavum Nerukkavum,
54 anega Kaariyangalaik Kuriththuppesumpadi Avarai Evavum Thodanginaargal.
